hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "It is not lawful for a woman (at the time of wedding) to ask for the divorce of her sister (i.e. the other wife of her would-be husband) in order to have everything for herself, for she will take only what has been written for her

chapter.ara-name: باب الشُّرُوطِ الَّتِي لاَ تَحِلُّ فِي النِّكَاحِ
chapter.eng-name: Conditions not lawful in the marriage contract
